Cleveland.Near West Theatre: The Near West Theatre is an independent public funded theatre troupe housed in a brand-new 275-seat venue that is located in the Gordon Square Arts District of The Detroit-Shoreway neighborhood of Cleveland, Ohio. Located along the major thoroughfare Detroit Avenue, which is not far down the street from the Cleveland Public Theatre, the performing arts company specializes in the development of at-risk youth in the metropolitan area of Cleveland. It was founded in May 1978 by Stephanie Morrison, George Hrbek, and Robert Scullin as the Near West Side Shared Ministry Youth Theatre.
